trans-unit.source: Defines identifiers used to specify behavior of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FolderNameEditor.FolderBrowser" />.
trans-unit.target: 定義用來指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.FolderNameEditor.FolderBrowser" /> 的行為之識別項。

trans-unit.source: The folder browser can only return computers.
trans-unit.target: 資料夾瀏覽器只能傳回電腦。

trans-unit.source: If the user selects anything other than a computer, the **OK** button is grayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者選取電腦以外的物件，則 [確定] 按鈕會變為灰色。

trans-unit.source: The folder browser can return any object that it can return.
trans-unit.target: 資料夾瀏覽器可傳回任何能被傳回的物件。

trans-unit.source: The folder browser can only return printers.
trans-unit.target: 資料夾瀏覽器只能傳回印表機。

trans-unit.source: If the user selects anything other than a printer, the **OK** button is grayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者選取印表機以外的物件，則 [確定] 按鈕會變為灰色。

trans-unit.source: The folder browser will not include network folders below the domain level in the dialog box's tree view control, or allow navigation to network locations outside of the domain.
trans-unit.target: 資料夾瀏覽器不會將網域層級以下的網路資料夾包含在對話方塊的樹狀檢視控制項中，也不會允許巡覽至網域以外的網路位置。

trans-unit.source: The folder browser will only return local file system directories.
trans-unit.target: 資料夾瀏覽器只會傳回本機檔案系統目錄。

trans-unit.source: If the user selects folders that are not part of the local file system, the **OK** button is grayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者選取非本機檔案系統的資料夾，則 [確定] 按鈕會變為灰色。

trans-unit.source: The folder browser will only return obejcts of the local file system that are within the root folder or a subfolder of the root folder.
trans-unit.target: 資料夾瀏覽器只會傳回本機檔案系統上位於根資料夾或其子資料夾中的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the user selects a subfolder of the root folder that is not part of the local file system, the **OK** button is grayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者選取非本機檔案系統之根資料夾的子資料夾，則 [確定] 按鈕會變為灰色。

trans-unit.source: The folder browser includes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control in the browse dialog box that allows the user to type the name of an item.
trans-unit.target: 資料夾瀏覽器將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> 控制項包含在瀏覽對話方塊中，讓使用者輸入項目名稱。
